thread.title: Elton John to release new studio album in February
thread.title_full: Elton John to release new studio album in February

author: Tribune wire reports
title: Elton John to release new studio album in February
text:
Elton John to release new studio album in February Elton John Alexandre Loureiro / Getty Images 
Elton John performs at 2015 Rock in Rio on September 20, 2015 in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. 
Elton John performs at 2015 Rock in Rio on September 20, 2015 in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. (Alexandre Loureiro / Getty Images) Tribune wire reports Contact Reporter 
Elton John is still standing â€” and will release his 33rd studio album next year. 
John's publicists announced Thursday that "Wonderful Crazy Night" is set for release on Island Records on Feb. 5. The first single, "Looking Up," is out on Friday. 
"Wonderful Crazy Night" is co-produced by John and T Bone Burnett, who worked on the piano-playing star's rootsy, well-received 2013 release "The Diving Board." 
Lyrics are by Bernie Taupin, John's songwriting partner of almost five decades. 
John, 68, is one of Britain's most enduringly successful musicians, and a campaigner for gay rights around the world. He was knighted by Queen Elizabeth II in 1998 for his contributions to pop music and to the fight against AIDS.
